itunes:title: S1, E10: Are My Kids on Track: Spiritual Milestone Foundation
title: S1, E10: Are My Kids on Track: Spiritual Milestone Foundation
itunes:author: That Sounds Fun Network
itunes:subtitle: In this episode we talk about building a spiritual foundation, why it’s important to start with concrete ideas, conformity versus character development and how to create a safe place for your kids to build a spiritual foundation. This episode...
itunes:summary:
In this episode we talk about building a spiritual foundation, why it’s important to start with concrete ideas, conformity versus character development and how to create a safe place for your kids to build a spiritual foundation. This episode is a companion to chapter 9 of the Are My Kids on Track book. Be sure to download the free supplemental small group questions here.
 
Connect with Sissy, David and Melissa @raisingboysandgirls
Connect with Sarah @sarahwbragg or her podcast here
description:
In this episode we talk about building a spiritual foundation, why it’s important to start with concrete ideas, conformity versus character development and how to create a safe place for your kids to build a spiritual foundation. This episode is a companion to chapter 9 of the Are My Kids on Track book. Be sure to download the free supplemental small group questions here.

 

Connect with Sissy, David and Melissa @raisingboysandgirls

Connect with Sarah @sarahwbragg or her podcast here
content:encoded:
In this episode we talk about building a spiritual foundation, why it’s important to start with concrete ideas, conformity versus character development and how to create a safe place for your kids to build a spiritual foundation. This episode is a companion to chapter 9 of the Are My Kids on Track book. Be sure to download the free supplemental small group questions here.
